description:
Attorney John DeGirolamo is the founder and owner of The Law Offices of John DeGirolamo, Esq., in Tampa, Florida. Mr. DeGirolamo focuses his practice on aggressively representing husbands and fathers during divorce proceedings in order to give them a fair opportunity to obtain the most favorable outcome possible for their issues involving child custody and support, alimony, property division and other matters. Additionally, he serves the Tampa Bay community in personal injury matters, but primarily focuses on men's rights in family law.

Eschewing the labels people like to place on attorneys, Mr. DeGirolamo is known as a trial lawyer first and foremost, and he has achieved unprecedented success fighting for what his clients deserve. He considers proper trial preparation the most important factor in determining the outcome of a case.

Recognized for his exceptional trial skills and impeccable professionalism, he has earned numerous awards and honors throughout his career. Along with holding a perfect rating from AVVO, he received the site's Clients' Choice Award in 2018. In addition, he has received recognition from The National Trial Lawyers as one of the country's Top 100 Trial Lawyers and one of the Top 40 Under 40.

A 2006 graduate of The University of Tampa, Mr. DeGirolamo obtained his Juris Doctor from Barry University Dwayne O. Andreas School of Law in 2009. Along with practicing before all Florida state courts, he is also admitted to practice before the U.S. District Courts for the Middle and Southern Districts of Florida.

Mr. DeGirolamo is a member of The Stann Givens Family Law American Inn of Court of Tampa, Hillsborough County Bar Association - Family Law Division, and the Florida Bar's Family Law Division.
